meta.description: Language labels for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'musicview'

languageKey.label: Music Overview from Last.fm
Account Settings
Username (user.*)
Password
API-key (*.*)
Select what should be displayed
Group name (group.*)
User API
user.getEvents
user.getFriends: Whether or not to include information about friends' recent listening in the response.
user.getFriends: An integer used to limit the number of friends returned.
user.getInfo: A Last.fm method signature. See authentication for more information.
user.getLovedTracks
user.getNeighbours: An integer used to limit the number of neighbours returned
user.getPastEvents: The page number to scan to
user.getPastEvents: The number of events to return per page
user.getPlaylists
user.getRecentTracks: An integer used to limit the number of tracks returned
user.getTopAlbums: The time period over which to retrieve top albums for
user.getTopArtists: The time period over which to retrieve top artists for
user.getTopTags: Limit the number of tags returned
user.getTopTracks: The time period over which to retrieve top tracks for
user.getWeeklyAlbumChart: The date at which the chart should start from
user.getWeeklyAlbumChart: The date at which the chart should end on
user.getWeeklyArtistChart: The date at which the chart should start from
user.getWeeklyArtistChart: The date at which the chart should end on
user.getWeeklyChartList
user.getWeeklyTrackChart: The date at which the chart should start from
user.getWeeklyTrackChart: The date at which the chart should end on
Group API
group.getWeeklyAlbumChart: The date at which the chart should start from
group.getWeeklyAlbumChart: The date at which the chart should end on
group.getWeeklyArtistChart: The date at which the chart should start from
group.getWeeklyArtistChart: The date at which the chart should end on
group.getWeeklyChartList
group.getWeeklyTrackChart: The date at which the chart should start from
group.getWeeklyTrackChart: The date at which the chart should end on
Display Settings
Error Handling Settings
Disable the Rich Text Editor
Show Errors
Text to prepend errors with
